Package org.midica.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorMsgView
    This class provides a window for error messages.
    ExportResultView
    This class provides a window for showing the result of file exports.
    FileExtensionFilter
    Provides a filter for a JFileChooser to filter files by file extensions.
    FileSelector
    Provides a file selector window for choosing files with a certain set of extensions.
    MessageController
    This class is used as an ActionListener for a MessageView window.
    MessageView
    This class provides a modal window belonging to a parent window.
    SliderHelper
    This class provides helper methods to fine-tune the behavior of JSliders.
    UiController
    This class provides the controller of the main window.
    UiView
    This class provides the main window containing configuration area, player button and file import/export buttons.
